name: Caravan: The Demo
description:
Welcome to the town of Amberton, where everything is totally quiet and some things totally aren't!

Nothing in this demo is final, Not dialogue, Icons, Soundtrack...NOTHING! I just wanted to put together a quick demo, so everyone could get a feel for the tone and story. Enjoy Defeating Rat Porn and saving old men from Attack Tomatoes.

Contents:

Two Quests

Two Fights 

TONS of people to talk to.....enjoy (Nervous laughter).
